item.title: Kristen Stewart’s Directorial Debut ‘The Chronology of Water’ to Close Oldenburg
item.description: Stewart’s first feature as a director premiered in Un Certain Regard in Cannes and was picked up for North America by The Forge.

item.title: The Twilight Saga to Return to Theaters in October
item.description: The hit franchise released five films starring Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson and Taylor Lautner from 2008 to 2012.

item.title: Kristen Stewart’s Directorial Debut ‘The Chronology of Water’ Getting Awards Season Release Date
